title: Onboarding Remote Tech Employees to Microsoft Teams
description: A practical, easy-to-follow course for onboarding remote tech employees to Microsoft Teams. The goal is to help them feel comfortable and confident using Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivityâ€”without overwhelming them with too much information at once.
goal: Generate a practical, easy-to-follow course for onboarding remote tech employees to Microsoft Teams
audience: Remote tech employees new to Microsoft Teams

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.description: An introduction to the key features and benefits of using Microsoft Teams for remote tech employees.

sections.title: Setting Up Your Profile
sections.description: Step-by-step guide on how to set up your profile in Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Chat Basics
sections.description: Learn the basics of sending and receiving messages within Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Video Calls
sections.description: How to conduct video calls and manage audio settings for effective communication.

sections.title: File Sharing
sections.description: Understanding how to share files and collaborate in real-time using channels.

sections.title: Meetings
sections.description: Scheduling, joining, and managing meetings within Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Using Apps for Workflows
sections.description: Exploring how to use apps within Teams to streamline your daily tasks.
